quote: Write what you know.
author: Mark Twain,  The Adventures of Tom Sawyer & Adventures of Huckleberry Finn

quote: Know what you are talking about.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: I only know that I know nothing
author: Socrates

quote: You know that I know you know, but I want you to know that I know you know I know you know I know. It’s important for you to know that, you know?
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.

quote: Everything I know, I know because of love.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace

quote: On Knowledge: You know that I know you know, but I want you to know that I know you know I know you know I know. It’s important for you to know that, you know?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: You don’t know anything, but I know even less.
author: Dejan Stojanovic,  The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Of course you know, this means war.
author: Joe Adamson,  Bugs Bunny Fifty Years And Only One Grey Hare

quote: I don't write about what I know: I write in order to find out what I know.
author: Patricia Hampl

quote: Knowing it and seeing it are two different things.
author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay

quote: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing. So is a lot.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: All knowledge hurts.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quote: I do not know everything; still many things I understand.
author: Madeleine L'Engle,  A Wrinkle in Time

quote: There is a long time in me between knowing and telling.
author: Grace Paley,  Enormous Changes at the Last Minute

quote: I only know everything if you ask the right questions.
author: Doc Coleman

quote: Somebody knows.
author: Ally Carter

quote: I know you're tired but come, this is the way.
author: Rumi

quote: We understand more than we know.
author: Margaret Atwood,  Oryx and Crake

quote: The more I read, the less I know.
author: Zeshan Ali Sheikh

quote: You know, everybody's ignorant, just on different subjects.
author: Will Rogers

quote: People don't care how much you know until they know how much you care
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You could do a lot worse.
author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire

quote: I'm not young enough to know everything.
author: J.M. Barrie,  The Admirable Crichton

quote: It's what you learn after you know it all that counts.
author: John Wooden

quote: Not knowing you can't do something, is sometimes all it takes to do it.
author: Ally Carter

quote: All knowledge is worth having.
author: Jacqueline Carey,  Kushiel's Dart

quote: Knowing was a temptation. What you don't know won't tempt you.
author: Margaret Atwood,  The Handmaid's Tale

quote: Know thyself.
author: Socrates

quote: I knew it, but I knew you didn’t know I knew it, so I knew to not let you know I knew it by acting like I didn’t know it.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Title is Invisible

quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
author: Helen Keller

quote: nothing that is worth knowing can be taught
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You know you made it, when people you know, tell people they know, that you know them.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: If you don't know everything, you must go on with what you do know.
author: Robert Jordan,  A Crown of Swords

quote: Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't.
author: Bill Nye

quote: Don't write to sell, write to tell.
author: Jonas Eriksson

quote: Knowledge was like candy: you never turned it down, especially if you didn't have to work too hard to get it.
author: Robert Liparulo,  House of Dark Shadows

quote: You don't know what you can get away with until you try.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Impossible things are really rough to do, you know.
author: Brandon Sanderson,  Alcatraz Versus the Shattered Lens

quote: It was better to know the worst than to wonder.
author: Margaret Mitchell,  Gone with the Wind

quote: All we know is what we're told.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: To know you are ignorant is the beginning of wisdom.
author: Marion Zimmer Bradley

quote: No one cares how much you know, until they know how much you care
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Shall I teach you what knowledge?When you know a thing, say that you know it;when you do not know a thing,admit that you do not know it.That is knowledge
author: Confucius

quote: To be too knowing is a downfall.
author: Laura Linney

quote: I know certain truths about life.
author: Dana Reinhardt,  How to Build a House

quote: To know is good, but to know how to use that knowledge is better. And to acknowledge the wisdom in this is the best.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: The more you know, the less you need.
author: Yvon Chouinard,  Let My People Go Surfing: The Education of a Reluctant Businessman

quote: I am not omniscient, but I know a lot.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe,  Faust: First Part

quote: You know me better than you think, you know, and you shall know me better yet.
author: C.S. Lewis,  The Magician's Nephew

quote: When I wanted to know something, I wanted it undistorted by somebody else's imperfect knowledge.
author: Milton H. Erickson
